name: Tomb of the Sun God
description:
If it doesn't work, try loading it in Firefox

Please play in full screen mode

If you're having trouble, try using the spacebar to attack while being chased by an enemy. This will cause the enemy to move while you can keep your current position. Also, in the case where you and the enemy would hit each other simultaneously, you will always deal damage first. This means if the enemy would be killed, you won't take any damage. Remember that using Shift to turn doesn't allow the enemy to hit you. Good luck and have fun!

After you're done playing, please let us know what you thought by rating us (link at the top of the page), or in the comments below.
